briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Bromfenac Ophthalmic Solution in Cataract Surgery

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Scheduled for cataract surgery

Exclusion Criteria:

* Known hypersensitivity to bromfenac and salicylates

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Summed Ocular Inflammation Score (SOIS) of Zero
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with SOIS of 0. Scale: 0=0 cells (complete absence); 0.5=1-5 cells; 1=6-15 cells (very slight); 2=16-25 cells (moderate); 3=26-50 cells (marked); 4=\>50 cells (intense)

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants That Are Pain Free
outcomeMeasures.description: Participant description of being pain free (Score of none)taken from patient questionnaire, Ocular Comfort Grading Assessment with multiple possible responses
